scripts.start:dev: npm run start:webservice:dev && npm run start:client:dev
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:webservice && npm start:client
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.eslint: cd client && npm run eslint && cd ..
scripts.jsdoc: cd client && npm run jsdoc && cd ..
